sentences.sContent: Activists who were involved in crimes of violence will not automatically be granted amnesty.
sentences.sCn: 参与暴力犯罪的活跃分子不会被自动地给予赦免。

remMethod.val: a(无) + mnes(记忆) + ty → 不再记仇 → 大赦， 特赦

trans.tranOther: an official order by a government that allows a particular group of prisoners to go free
